api_list.name: Forecast Server - All parameters
api_list.description: Fetch forecasts for a desired location for all parameters by specifying latitude, longitude, and desired timestamps.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://excarta-apis.p.rapidapi.com/{latitude}/{longitude}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "excarta-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Forecast Server
api_list.description: Fetch forecasts for a desired location by specifying latitude, longitude, parameter, and desired timestamps.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://excarta-apis.p.rapidapi.com/{param}/{latitude}/{longitude}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "excarta-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
